history.narrative: Law 3-124 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-269, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 14, 1980 and November 25, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 22, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-331 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
